extendedInfo.description: For almost 60 years, Energy Intelligence newsletters have delivered high-quality analysis of the most important developments in the industry, sent directly to your mailbox, inbox, mobile, fax machine or web portal and these are now available on Android phones and Tablets.Existing Energy Intelligence web subscribers will be able to access all publications that they are subscribed to via the app for convenience. Those with subscriptions to our research reports will be able to access these using the Tablet version.We monitor events as they unfold and relate them to trends and issues in a way that provides our readers perspective and a deeper understanding covering areas such as Global Oil, North American Gas, Global Gas and LNG and Global Uranium.Products available on mobile format include:Petroleum Intelligence WeeklyEnergy CompassEnergy Intelligence BriefingEnergy Intelligence FinanceInternational Oil DailyJet Fuel IntelligenceLNG IntelligenceNatural Gas WeekNGW's Gas Market ReconnaissanceNefte CompassOil DailyOil Market IntelligenceNuclear Intelligence WeeklyWorld Gas IntelligenceEI SelectEI StreamsSelected Research Reports (Tablet only)

reviews.comment: Good coverage for news but lot of bugs. doesn\'t work for Google Nexus7\tCrashes almost 90% of d times.. If d application opens, very good and detailed news coverage.... Please develope an app that is compatible with Google Nexus 7
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freezing
reviews.comment: The app keeps freezing when i try to view any article
reviews.author: Rayed B

reviews.comment:
-Allow offline reading (like the ft app)
-Scheduled downloading
-Share articles
-Rotate view
reviews.author: A Google User
